The diarrhea has led to a noticeable weight loss of 15 lbs over the past three months. Despite the increased fluid intake, he reports symptoms of dehydration. Notably, the patient has a history of autoimmune thyroiditis. He is a former smoker and is currently not taking any medications. These symptoms have significantly affected his quality of life. The diagnostic process should take into account the patient's age, sex, autoimmune disease history, and the impact of previous smoking habits.
